1.0.name: wordpress/many-sidebars
1.0.description: When you use Wordpress as a CMS, it's very common to create so many sidebars that when you try to manipulate each one on the Widgets page, you get totally crazy trying to drag and drop the widgets to the right sidebar. Because of this problem I did the Many Sidebars plugin that simply organize all your sidebars and let you work on each one solely.
